snippet.title: Spellfarers - Steam Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Farm, fish, craft, and cast spells with your friends in this idyllic, magical MMO farming sim. Play as a Witch sent to investigate the disappearance of a fellow magical researcher, who was lost while uncovering the secrets of the nearby Wilds, leaving behind a strange spellbook. Befriend the local townsfolk of peaceful Wenngrove, learn their trades and their stories, and make a beautiful home alongside your trusty Familiar.

Spellfarers is a live multi-player world with seasonal festivals, each with unique minigames, items and community goals. Sew yourself a new outfit, make furniture for your home, or maybe cook a big meal and have your friends over for a grand party - which may or may not include witchcraft!

Whether you prefer to gather together, or go solo, Wenngrove will always welcome you.

Find us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1569420

Join Our Discord:
https://discord.gg/pHQUtsVkD3
